pros:
Respectful of employees
Work from home 
Management team are awesome people who really care
cons: None that I can think of.

pros:
I have found the short while I have been for working Suffolk GP Federation to be enjoyable and rewarding. Staff all seem very friendly and helpful.

It’s been refreshing working somewhere with high moral and to see people enjoying their work. Everyone works together at all levels and there isn’t too much middle management problems. 

The CEO is very approachable which makes life so much easier than in my previous role. 

I have a lot of work to do but there is not much stress and you’re given time to get things right.
cons:
Not much office space or many meeting rooms.
Would be better if they had their own building

pros: The staff are great and work hard to help the patients in Suffolk.
cons:
No job security. Senior management makes mistakes with money causing them to take it out on staff with redundancies.

The Suffolk GP Federation got people to work through COVID-19 and then as things settle staff made redundant. No pay rises
